definition: to regard the same as/to regard as being the same as
to treat everyone equally favorably (idiom); not to discriminate between people
to regard sth as a plaything (idiom); to consider unimportant/to view as trifling
to regard sb as one's own child
to regard sb as a brother (idiom)

sentences.english: With no enquiry, you are deemed to have fully understood the terms and conditions of this insurance contract.
sentences.chinese: 如未詢問，則視同已經對合同內容完全理解並無異議。

sentences.english: The compiler treats the inline expansion options and keywords as suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 編譯器會將內嵌展開選項和關鍵字視同建議。

sentences.english: All assigned Appendices and supplements (if any) constitute an integral part of the present Contract.
sentences.chinese: 所有的附件均視同爲合同的一個不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: The new law discriminates between people employed in the same firm.
sentences.chinese: 新法規對在同一公司工作的人不一視同仁。

sentences.english: Heaven and earth do not act emotional, of all things equally.
sentences.chinese: 天地不情感用事，對萬物一視同仁。

sentences.english: There is no..You're like everybody else in my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 別誤會，我對大家一視同仁。
邁克喜愛孩子，一視同仁。

sentences.english: Because of their dangerousness , attempts are treated the same as completed acts of criminal sexual abuse.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們的危險和意圖被視同爲實施性侵犯行爲。

sentences.english: I say I am yet too young to understand that God is any respecter of person.
sentences.chinese: 我說，我還太年輕，難以理解上帝爲什麼不一視同仁。

sentences.english: The management probably equates fewer artifacts with less discipline.
sentences.chinese: 管理層可能將較少的工件與較少的原則一視同仁。

sentences.english: The post and telecommunications agency shall be considered to be the branch office of postal enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 郵電代辦所視同郵政企業所屬的分支機構。

sentences.english: There are those who see the fight against al-Qaeda as a war like the second world war or the cold war.
sentences.chinese: 有人將針對基地組織的戰鬥視同二戰或冷戰。

sentences.english: The Muse does not inspire all poets equally.
sentences.chinese: 詩神並不一視同仁地賜予所有詩人以靈感。

sentences.english: When dealing with this matter, he disregarded social status and treated everyone equally.
sentences.chinese: 處理這個事情，他不論尊卑一視同仁。

sentences.english: Death is no respecter of wealth.
sentences.chinese: 死神不問貧富，一視同仁。

sentences.english: H. Peter denounced false prophets and equated Paul's epistles with Scripture.
sentences.chinese: 彼得被譴責的假的先知和視同了保羅的書信以聖經。
